DOC.detailed_description: Bipolar Disorders ( BD ) associate chronic depression , disability , increase suicide risk . Building early finding , conduct 6-week randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial investigate efficacy midday light therapy bipolar depression . The aims examine change depression level proportion patient respond remit . We assess predictor response measure side effect , sleep quality , suicidality , psychosocial functioning . We include depressed adult BD-Type I II confirm SCID interview take stable-dosed antimanic medication . We exclude patient psychosis , rapid cycling , obsessive compulsive disorder , alcohol substance use disorder , hypomania mania , severe suicidality . Patients randomized 7000 lux broad spectrum light therapy OR 50 lux dim red light 45-60 minute daily . Weekly , blinded-clinician assess symptom Structured Interview Guide Hamilton Depression Scale Atypical Depression Supplement ( SIGH-ADS ) global functioning .
